name: podamShouldAssignPreciseValuesWithTheStringValueAnnotation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.StringValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the string value TLr7RjBtLS6ED52TXC9b should have the length of 20
Then the Object should not be null
Then string [preciseStringValue] should be exactly like string [preciseStringValue]

title: Podam should assign precise values and lengths when a String is annotated with @PodamStringValue
